headerColumnNamePkPrefix.description: Used to denote primary key columns when dealing with update/upsert files. Please see the [options](https://github.com/wmfs/tymly/tree/master/supercopy#options) section in [Supercopy](https://github.com/wmfs/tymly/tree/master/supercopy) for more details.

topDownTableOrder.description: Used to resolve foreign-key constraint issues - will be deprecated in favour of something more automatic. Please see the [options](https://github.com/wmfs/tymly/tree/master/supercopy#options) section in [Supercopy](https://github.com/wmfs/tymly/tree/master/supercopy) for more details.
